projects.title: Livelihood, Inclusion and Financial Empowerment (LIFE) Mission
projects.description: Comprehensive housing scheme to provide safe housing to nearly 4.30 lakhs homeless and landless families in Kerala. Focuses on livelihood, inclusion, and financial empowerment alongside shelter. Utilizes pre-fab technology and housing complexes.
projects.impact: Completed construction of over 4.5 lakh homes by March 2025; aims for a state free of homelessness.

projects.title: Kerala Fibre Optic Network (K-FON)
projects.description: State-wide core optical fibre network to provide high-speed internet connectivity to 30,000+ government offices and free internet to 20 lakh economically backward families. Declared internet access a basic human right.
projects.impact: Phase I completed; connected over 28,000 offices and thousands of BPL families; awarded Infrastructure Initiative of the Year 2024.

projects.title: Aardram Mission
projects.description: Transformation of Primary Health Centers (PHCs) into Family Health Centers (FHCs) with standardized facilities, extended timing, and patient-friendly outpatient services. Focuses on preventive care and lifestyle disease control.
projects.impact: Converted 674 out of 886 PHCs into FHCs by 2025; improved public health infrastructure significantly.

projects.title: Haritha Keralam Mission
projects.description: Umbrella mission for waste management, water conservation, and agricultural development. Initiatives include 'Pachathuruthu' (Green Islets), 'Ini Njan Ozhukatte' (river rejuvenation), and 'Net Zero Carbon Keralam'.
projects.impact: Rejuvenated 53,190 km of streams; created green islets; institutionalized decentralized waste management via Haritha Karma Sena.

projects.title: General Education Rejuvenation Mission (Vidyakiranam)
projects.description: Modernization of public school infrastructure, converting classrooms to hi-tech digital classrooms, and enhancing academic standards. Includes 'Little KITEs' IT clubs and 'First Bell' digital classes.
projects.impact: Set up 45,000 hi-tech classrooms; reversed trend of student migration to private schools; highest public enrollment growth in 25 years.

projects.title: SilverLine (Semi High-Speed Rail Corridor)
projects.description: Proposed 529.45 km semi high-speed railway line connecting Kasaragod to Thiruvananthapuram. Designed to reduce travel time to less than 4 hours. Includes RORO services and feeder networks.
projects.impact: Expected to decongest highways and reduce carbon emissions; currently facing land acquisition and clearance delays.

projects.title: Transgrid 2.0
projects.description: Comprehensive project to enhance the reliability and security of Kerala's electricity transmission system and reduce transmission losses. Involves construction of substations and high-tension lines.
projects.impact: Commissioned 12 substations; completed 1,746 circuit km of lines; expected to reduce peak load system loss by 107.8 MW.

projects.title: Rebuild Kerala Initiative (RKI)
projects.description: Strategic framework to rebuild the state following the 2018 floods with a focus on resilience, eco-friendly building strategies, and 'Room for River' concepts. Supported by World Bank and other agencies.
projects.impact: Repairing roads, restoring livelihoods, and creating resilient infrastructure across multiple sectors.

projects.title: Coastal Highway Project
projects.description: Construction of a dedicated highway along the Kerala coast from Thiruvananthapuram to Kasaragod. Features include cycle tracks and modern safety standards.
projects.impact: Will serve as an evacuation route and boost coastal tourism and connectivity.

projects.title: Hill Highway Project
projects.description: 1,251 km highway network connecting the hilly eastern districts of Kerala from Nandarappadavu (Kasaragod) to Parassala (Thiruvananthapuram).
projects.impact: Improves connectivity in high-range areas; boosts freight movement and tourism.

projects.title: Kerala Knowledge Economy Mission (KKEM)
projects.description: Initiative to transform Kerala into a knowledge economy by creating 20 lakh jobs for educated youth. Connects job seekers with global employers through a digital platform.
projects.impact: Facilitated employment for over 1.2 lakh individuals; created a digital platform for skill matching.

projects.title: Extreme Poverty Eradication Programme (EPEP)
projects.description: Targeted micro-plans to identify and uplift the 'poorest of the poor' families (approx 64,006) by providing food, health, housing, and income support.
projects.impact: Kerala declared the first extreme poverty-free state in India on November 1, 2025.

projects.title: Year of Enterprises
projects.description: Campaign to establish 1 lakh new Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) in one fiscal year. Provided subsidies, loan assistance, and simplified clearances.
projects.impact: Generated over 2.4 lakh jobs and investment of ₹6,667 crore; established nearly 1.4 lakh enterprises.

projects.title: Filament-Free Kerala
projects.description: Project to replace inefficient filament bulbs with energy-efficient LED bulbs in all households to reduce energy consumption and carbon emissions.
projects.impact: Aims to reduce daily CO2 emissions by 2.5 million tonnes and mercury pollution.

projects.title: Subhiksha Keralam
projects.description: Integrated program to achieve self-sufficiency in food production post-COVID-19. Combines agriculture, animal husbandry, dairy, and fisheries to ensure food security.
projects.impact: Significant increase in vegetable and milk production; creation of livelihood assets like cattle sheds and farm ponds.

projects.title: Punargeham Project
projects.description: Rehabilitation project for fisher families living within 50 meters of the high tide line. Provides ₹10 lakh per family for relocation to safer zones.
projects.impact: Thousands of families rehabilitated; flats constructed in multiple coastal districts.

projects.title: Jal Jeevan Mission (State Implementation)
projects.description: Implementation of the central scheme to provide functional household tap connections (FHTC) to every rural household in Kerala.
projects.impact: Significantly increased rural water supply coverage.

projects.title: Safe Kerala Project
projects.description: Installation of Artificial Intelligence (AI) cameras and enforcement systems across state roads to detect traffic violations and reduce accidents.
projects.impact: Enhanced road safety monitoring and enforcement capabilities.

projects.title: K-Smart
projects.description: Digital platform to provide all services of Local Self Government Institutions (LSGIs) online. Aims for paperless and transparent local governance.
projects.impact: Streamlined service delivery for citizens across municipalities and corporations.

projects.title: National Highway 66 Widening (State Share)
projects.description: Widening of National Highway 66 to 45 meters from Kasaragod to Thiruvananthapuram. State government contributed 25% of land acquisition cost to expedite the project.
projects.impact: Rapid progress in 6-laning works across the state; expected completion by 2025.

projects.title: GAIL Natural Gas Pipeline
projects.description: Completion of the Kochi-Mangaluru natural gas pipeline, connecting Kerala to the National Gas Grid. Facilitates city gas distribution and industrial usage.
projects.impact: Enabled piped gas supply to households and industries in northern Kerala.

projects.title: Anuyatra
projects.description: Comprehensive campaign to make Kerala a disability-friendly state. Includes early intervention, education, and rehabilitation programs like 'Spectrum' and 'Sruthitharangam'.
projects.impact: Improved accessibility and support systems for differently-abled individuals.

projects.title: Kerala Bank
projects.description: Formation of the Kerala State Co-operative Bank by merging District Co-operative Banks (except Malappuram) to create a strong banking entity for the state.
projects.impact: Enhanced financial inclusion and credit availability in the cooperative sector.

projects.title: Digital Land Survey (Ente Bhumi)
projects.description: Comprehensive digital resurvey of land across the state using modern technology like COR stations and drones to ensure accurate land records.
projects.impact: Expected to resolve land disputes and modernize revenue records.

projects.title: Kerala Solid Waste Management Project (KSWMP)
projects.description: World Bank-assisted project to strengthen the institutional and service delivery systems for solid waste management in 93 Urban Local Bodies.
projects.impact: Improving waste collection, segregation, and treatment infrastructure in urban areas.

projects.title: One District One Idea (ODOI)
projects.description: Programme to foster innovation and development of MSME clusters in each district, focusing on unique local products and technologies.
projects.impact: Promoting cluster-based industrial growth.

projects.title: Soura Project
projects.description: Rooftop solar energy project by KSEB targeting 1000 MW capacity addition by utilizing roof spaces of households and institutions.
projects.impact: Significant addition to renewable energy capacity.

projects.title: e-Health Project
projects.description: Digital health database linking all government health institutions to provide seamless patient records and services. Implemented in all districts.
projects.impact: Digitized patient records and improved healthcare delivery efficiency.

projects.title: West Coast Canal Development
projects.description: Development of the inland waterway from Kovalam to Kasaragod (approx 600 km) to make it navigable for cargo and tourism.
projects.impact: Enhancing inland water transport and tourism potential.

projects.title: Work Near Home (WNH)
projects.description: Establishment of remote work centres across the state to enable professionals to work for global companies from their hometowns.
projects.impact: Decentralizing IT employment and supporting the knowledge economy.

projects.title: Navakiranam
projects.description: Voluntary relocation project for non-tribal settlements from forest areas to reduce human-wildlife conflict.
projects.impact: Facilitating safe relocation and forest conservation.

projects.title: Construction of 10 bedded isolation wards in 140 LAC
projects.description: Project to construct 10-bedded isolation wards in hospitals across all 140 Legislative Assembly Constituencies to handle infectious diseases.
projects.impact: Strengthening healthcare infrastructure post-pandemic.

projects.title: Kochi-Bengaluru Industrial Corridor (Kerala Stretch)
projects.description: Development of industrial nodes in Palakkad and Kochi as part of the national corridor. Includes Integrated Manufacturing Clusters and GIFT City.
projects.impact: Expected to attract ₹10,000 crore investment and generate 1 lakh jobs.

projects.title: 10 Nos. Road Over Bridges across Kerala (Steel Concrete)
projects.description: Construction of 10 Road Over Bridges using steel-concrete composite superstructure on Design Build and Transfer mode across the state.
projects.impact: Improving road safety and rail-road connectivity.

projects.title: Apna Ghar
projects.description: Housing scheme providing high-quality dormitory accommodation for migrant workers with modern amenities.
projects.impact: Completed projects in Palakkad and Kozhikode; improved living conditions for migrant laborers.

projects.title: Safe to Eat
projects.description: Program to promote pesticide-free vegetable cultivation and sales, ensuring food safety.
projects.impact: Increased availability of safe produce.

projects.title: Pink Police Patrol
projects.description: Specialized police patrol units exclusively for the safety of women and children in public places.
projects.impact: Enhanced women's safety and quick response to distress calls.

projects.title: Agathirahitha Keralam (Destitute Free Kerala)
projects.description: Scaled-up version of the Ashraya project to rehabilitate the absolute poor and destitute through micro-plans and support services.
projects.impact: Rehabilitating the poorest sections of society.

projects.title: Snehahastham
projects.description: Financial assistance scheme for kidney patients on dialysis, providing monthly pensions.
projects.impact: Supporting vulnerable patients with chronic illness.

projects.title: Creation of 45,000 Hi-Tech Classrooms
projects.description: Project to equip 45,000 classrooms in public schools with computers, projectors, and internet connectivity.
projects.impact: Modernized public education infrastructure.

projects.title: One Local Government One Idea (OLOI)
projects.description: Program encouraging each Local Self Government to identify and solve one core local issue through innovation and research partnerships.
projects.impact: Fostering local level innovation and problem solving.

projects.title: Kerala Genome Data Centre (KGDC)
projects.description: Establishment of a genome data center to utilize Kerala's biodiversity for genetic research in agriculture, health, and fisheries.
projects.impact: Building a repository of genetic information for scientific advancement.
